LatestNews.Title: Jets part ways with reserve RB Joe McKnight

LatestNews.Content: Jets RB Joe McKnight was arrested in New Jersey last week for outstanding warrants after police pulled him over for speeding and changing lanes without signaling.

LatestNews.Title: Jets RB Joe McKnight arrested in New Jersey

LatestNews.Content: Jets RB Joe McKnight is moving to cornerback "in a near full-time role."
